description: Hello, I'm an introverted and curious woman who is better at writing than anything else, I like to ask questions (although I'm not a journalist). Dreamy, smiling and idealistic.I'm a writer, especially I like fantasy (reading and writing), although I read a bit of everything. Also, I have restless hands and always have some craft proyect in process.As a professional, I'm an editor and designer publishing.I looking for something with who writing us about allthing.
